title: Transfers
body: Before 4 or 5 years i moved my account from EU to Oceania but since then i stopped playing .Now i have shown interest in the game again but I cant play because i live in Eastern Europe and the ping  is awful.I searched for a transfer option but i cannot find it.Could someone tell me what to do?

replies.body: Transfers are still undergoing some maintenance, but we did get an update relatively recently by HollyMonster saying they should be back up late Jan or early Feb and there should be some discount attached.

The account Transfer is being fix, it would be available soon around this month or the next one.

You might want to save some money just in case you have to pay for it.
